insert into t_parklot_loan (lotloanId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, loanMan, loanTel, mortgageStatus, loanCycle, loanRate, overdueStatus, overdueTimes, carparkId) values (#{lotloanid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loantel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgagestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loancycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loanrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{overduestatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{overduetimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_parklot_loan set parklotNum = #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parkCentificateNum = #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loanMan = #{loanman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loanTel = #{loantel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mortgageStatus = #{mortgagestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loanCycle = #{loancycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loanRate = #{loanrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, overdueStatus = #{overduestatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, overdueTimes = #{overduetimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where lotloanId = #{lotloanid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select lotloanId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, loanMan, loanTel, mortgageStatus, loanCycle, loanRate, overdueStatus, overdueTimes, carparkId from t_parklot_loan where lotloanId = #{lotloanid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
